edu.first.robot

Class SimpleRobotAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.first.robot.SimpleRobot
      • edu.first.robot.SimpleRobotAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RobotMode

    public class SimpleRobotAdapter
extends SimpleRobot
    An adapter pattern class for robot modes that use the SimpleRobot class, but do not need to use all of its methods. Basically, if a robot mode does not use all of its methods, it should extend this class instead to avoid clutter.
    Since:
    May 08 13

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleRobotAdapter(java.lang.String name)
      Constructs the robot mode using the name to show the user.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleRobotAdapter

        public SimpleRobotAdapter(java.lang.String name)
        Constructs the robot mode using the name to show the user. The name should be recognizable, like "Defensive Mode" or "Single Driver Mode".
        Parameters:
        name - easily understandable phrase to refer to the mode as

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Runs once when the robot is starting. Follows the same timing as GamePeriods.robotInit().
